name: Jodie McKinley
text:
Rude. Unprofessional. Sketchy operation.

I was referred to these people by a car salesman because I needed help with the down payment for a vehicle. All three employees were on the phone. I could tell they were calling people to demand payment. When I finally got to talk to talk to someone, I told the lady taking my application how much money I needed. She actually laughed rudely and said we don’t loan that much. I should have walked out at that point but I continued with my application. I gave her all my information, plus paystubs. She asked if there was someone who could verify my address, and I gave her my neighbor’s name and number (who she proceeded to call immediately). I could tell my neighbor was suspicious getting a call like that out of the blue because she was telling him the name of the company (which scarily was NOT Covington Credit, it was some vague name that could have been anyone) and he asked to speak to me. She put him on speaker and I told him it was ok to release my information but never once did she tell him I was applying for a loan. Only that she was calling from such and such company and the way she called and demanded information from him was embarrassing. She also couldn’t get anyone on the phone at my work to verify my employment because I am employed at a school (but they had my check stubs), so she proceeded to tell me “sorry we can’t help you”. Really? Tell me that before I hand over sensitive financial information to you and you call my neighbor out of the blue demanding to know if I live where I say I do.

I went a few doors down to Central Credit. Totally different atmosphere. Super nice lady at the front desk who went over my application and explained everything to me. No rudeness. No derision. No embarrassing calls. I walked out about 30 minutes later with my money.

If ever in need of cash, I would avoid this place. If you couldn’t get cash from Central Credit, I would go to a payday loan place before I borrowed money from these people.

name: Julie Mcdonald
text: Rude.

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear that you have not had a good experience with us. We would like to learn more about your situation. Please send your contact information to Communications@heightsfinance.com and someone from our team will reach out to you.

name: Michelle Brown
text: Covington Credit offered me money when I was in need.  Yes  at a high interest rate but not as high as a payday loan   The young ladies that work their are always kinrkind and answer all of my questions with professionalism and kindness.  Being a disabled OIF war veteran and only getting paid once a month is hard   Plus, this helps me build my credit back up

If that doesn't work i will take you to court and sue you

text: 28 phone calls in 20 days to my personal cell phone, 25 phone calls in 20 days to my work phone, 18 calls to my husband's cell phone, 20 calls to my best friend's cell phone, 10 text messages to my personal cell phone... Guess how far behind I am? I'm not! I'm actually paid in full and paid in full 2+ months early. If you are considering a loan, I STRONGLY urge you to go elsewhere. I have had many loans to help build my credit, and of all the companies I've ever used, Covington is BY FAR THE WORST!

name: Patricia Ward
text: If you pay your loan on time, everything is fine. But as soon as you fall behind one payment, they become rude and harass you(pop up at your house etc...) this is a loan place I DEFINITELY WILL NOT do business with again, nor will I refer somebody to this place. I really don't want to judge the company off the attitude and professionalism of it's employees...but hey, you hired them. I don't know how other locations are because I've only had dealings with the one in Bessemer. If you plan on starting a loan process with them, I advise you to try a different company..or a different location.

name: T Crenie
text: They're very unprofessional, disrespectful, just plain old rude.  Their communication skills are terrible!!!  Will NEVER, deal with this company again.

name: Mark Elders
text: If you get behind, and even if you call and then get caught back up, the women at this particular loan place, Covington Credit, get really heavy-handed and very condescending to the point of trying to make the client feel incompetent and stupid, even berating clients in front of other clients. Just 4 more payments and we are DONE with Covington Credit forever. It's too bad also, but one lady named Latrice, who sits towards the back is very pleasant and very professional. But apparently, Covington Credit is one of those businesses who believe verbally bullying customers is the most effective way to customers/clients on "on track." These days, there are so many financial companies eager to lend money and who make their customers feel special for anyone to go for money where they make customers feel like dummies who need a "good yellin' at" every now and then. Predicting this location will close up within a year. Sad. God bless! Mark N Tim Elders  :(

name: Frugal Granny
text:
I have never been late on my payment until recently.one little payment of $105.00. I informed them that I was not able to make it to the office that day because I was in a lot of pain, and I was having to get a ride to pick up my meds.
They were very Rude and asked if my driver could take me to the office.When I get my loan paid off,I'm Done with them.

name: Chasity Quirantes
text: Will never recommend anyone to do business here as long as Tommy is there I have had loans here before and always paid them off early after my husband had a heart attack I lost my job for staying with him in hospital well needless to say Tommy doesnt care at all harassed me at home called numerous times a day with ugly messages then finally after two months found a job was told since I found work they could now offer me a hardship offer  told me to take them 35 dollars when I got my first check in two weeks and sign paperwork well I went in today to do just that walk in the office and try to pay the 35 to be told it is 87 I told him what they had said earlier and he said that was two weeks ago not now that now I have to pay 87 I told him I didn't have that much he said I had to so I told him that means I can't pay it today cause I do t have it and he slams hands on desk tells me to get out his office then I asked why it was 87 and he told me to leave again never explained why it went up as I was walking to door my friend asked why we were being told to leave because I didn't have enough on me and he screamed at us told us to get the f*** out of his store now I called corporate still waiting o call back nobody should be allowed to treat someone that way ever I would never talk to someone like that I could understand if I was giving him a hard time for him to get snappy but I wasn't  I will never use this company again and would strongly suggest Noone else either !!!!!

name: Tiffany Butterfield
text: One more payment and reading the last reviews I will not use them anymore nor any other finance company.

name: Seth B
text: Just another shady loan office spaming out deceptive loan offers.

name: Julie Rustic
text: Someone from this office used my credit card info, after I made my payment with them by phone, to make a fraudulent sprint charge for 452.90!!!

name: Brent Miller
text: Great people.

name: Shanece Mckinney
text: I have known Amber since her college and professional basketball days. The same fire and intensity she had on court she puts into her business! Amber is definitely a servant leader in the way she provides help and tips to people who may not even be her clients! For that she will always be blessed in business and life! I have had amazing results since starting my credit journey with Life Key. Keep up the great work Amber and the rest of the staff at Life Key Financial!

name: Darius Walker
text: Amber and her team set the standard high and they ALWAYS rise above! Excellent people with excellent service and they are so patient with you as they help you accomplish whatever financial credit goal you have! You cannot go wrong choosing LifeKey Financial!!!

name: Adrienne Owens
text: This place is literally a life changing journey!!! They are very responsive and you have a better experience here than with creditrepair.com. They take their time, listen, and understand your needs!! I know soon I will reach my goal less than a year by practicing the things they taught me. Amber has hands down done what a CEO should which is mastering customer service!!!

name: Chef Rosalind
text: I recently purchased Cracking the Credit Code and the Ultimate Business Credit e-books and must say they were concise and to the point.  Very well written Amber!  Both e-books were a good read and easy to follow with valuable information for any business.  Thank you so much for your knowledge and guidance, and the consultation.  I will be highly recommending you to anyone that may be in need of your services.  Thanks again.  Many blessings!

name: Chrystal Mitchell
text: My fiancé and I went to Life Key Financial Group a few months ago in order to seek help with our credit scores. Amber was able to immediately evaluate are credit as well as give us amazing advice on how to increase our scores. She listened and helped both of us out tremendously and we really appreciate her. Not only did she help our credit scores she also helped us become more knowledgeable during this journey. She’s extremely friendly and very professional. I recommend her services to all my friends and family members. Can’t wait to continue working with Life Key Financial Group!

name: CandiiLand Pastries
text:
The team at Life Key is phenomenal! They respond in a timely manor and is always professional. I am in the process of building my new business and looking to purchase a home this year. Ms. Jones and her staff has continued to assist me through these processes and is making my experience easy and stress free. I would highly recommend this company. I have learned so much that I was blind to through her educational sessions, E book, and consultations. They are very knowledgeable when it come to financial literacy. I am so glad I chose Life Key to help guide me in becoming a homeowner and a business owner.
Thanks Life Key!

name: Porneshea Armstead
text: Life Key Financial Group is an exceptional Company. My credit score jumped up to a hundred points in less than 90 days. I had very poor credit, my credit report was awful. I was so embarrassed to be a 31 years of age and couldn't get a retail credit card, and I didn't want anyone to look at my credit report! Life Key Literally made me feel like that my life was going to change! What I Love Most About the company Was the diligent plan that they had laid out personally for me. Meaning they don't just have inquires removed from from your report and ever customer plan and service will be different! Life Key Financial Group takes you through a step by step process, and teaches you what a credit score is, how to maintain it and the importance of credit! After speaking with them I had felt like they gave me the blueprint to a healthy long lasting financial life!!!

name: Doyin Adewole
text:
We are living in truly unprecedented times and our credit took a direct hit as a result. We decided to trust Life Key Financial Group with not only repairing our credit, but building our credit as well. We realized that once the effects of the pandemic had passed, credit would rule the day. While finances are very strained right now, we were willing to make the investment, and the results have been nothing but miraculous!
We saw major improvements of over 60-120 points in only 3 months.
While the system does work, please note that it is not “magic”. It takes a while to damage your lending history and repairing it does take work.
We were truly impressed by the professionalism of LKFG staff and how detailed the credit “Education process” is. We both feel unpowered after receiving not only the service, but also the valuable information/steps on how credit actually works.
I highly recommenced Life Key Financial Group to anyone who is truly serious about credit repair and gaining the tools to increase the quality of their lives.

text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, we strive to provide great guest service!

name: Rachel LeNae
text: They offer free coffee in the lobby, but were extremely rude when my friend fixed a cup before getting in line.

name: Ricky Louis
text: Mike Newman is very honest and patient. Great listener.  He genuinely cares for your best interest.  That's why I trust him with my future. Thank Mike

name: Tom Beaty
text: Mike Newman is one of the most honest, ethical people I know. You can definitely trust him with a variety of financial services.

name: Ricky Trione Art
text: Ralph Anderson is the most honest and dedicated person we know in the Financial Planning Field!  We highly respect and trust Ralph! We are proud to giving him our very highest Recommendations!  He will truly be a very valuable blessing to you and your family!  Excellent Services!

name: Landon Rogers
text: I would highly recommend giving Ralph Anderson a call if you are looking for a financial planner! After using him for years, I can confidently tell you that he is by far the most professional, well organized and attentive financial planner I have ever met!

name: Tom Aiken
text: Mike Newman has tremendous experience and is a joy to work with.  I recommend him highly.

name: Ursula Lowe
text: They are always there for their clients

name: Charles Dean
text: Matt and staff are always helpful. I high recommend them for your financial needs.

name: Davanna Clayton
text: I opted out for 401k never had any problems until they decided to take $50 out of my check randomly, I filled out my reimbursement form and mailed it off to get my FULL refund and they send me a $4 check. This is nothing but a scam. I wish I could leave a negative star.

name: Goddbod. Junya “iceberg” Winston
text: clean establishment and courteous employees...

name: Pamela Lewis
text: Been a customer for years . Happy people happy place. Very personal.

name: Brian Burke
text:
He was fantastic. My scheduled appointment time ended up not working so we rescheduled, he called me and said something had come up and got me in immediately which worked perfectly for me. I appreciated his ability to fit me in so quickly.

He is very professional, well spoken, and knowledgeable. I knew I was opening an account, my wife was with me, she wasn't planning on investing but thankfully ended up doing so after a short talk with him. Can't say enough good about him, already made a great return on my investment.
